column1: Smoque BBQ////The trees were greened out in buds and baby leaves. The grass was lush and the ground was dry. We got two slabs of St. Louis style ribs with creamy crusty edged mac and cheese
column3: well seasoned fries and peach cobbler
column4: which we got to later. Actually there was cole slaw too
column5: but haven't got to that yet either. The ribs were unbelievable
column7: so much smoky flavor that my hands still smell like a campfire. They need no sauce. I ate half the slab and was so full I meat-tripped the rest of the afternoon well into the evening.
